question: Which day related to sports is celebrated for the first time on July 20, 2020?
explanation:
The International Chess Day is celebrated on July 20 every year as the founding day of the FIDE, the World Chess Federation.
On the same day in the year 1924, the FIDE federation was formed at the eighth summer Olympic games in Paris. It has been celebrated from 1966 as International Chess Day but the United Nations declared July 20 as World Chess Day in 2019. So, the day is celebrated for the first time this year.
